Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{3: '—3.9 km away from the conservation area reconstruction site 03.'}
{3: 'Inside the library amidst an ocean of small bookshelves, a white hat breaches the "surface."'}
{3: 'Holding onto the shelves, Haicma lifts her head, trying very hard to scan the books at the top.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'How much longer are you going to look?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I'm not sure. At worst, until I finish browsing every book in this area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Why are you going this far?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Our database has yet to record all human knowledge, Spooner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I believe fixing a hole after discovering it is the responsible thing to do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Then how about letting me help upload all these books?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Spooner, do you know how humans define a "miracle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "It's probably... an after-the-fact conclusion of an event that happened but is almost statistically impossible?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'What if that event keeps happening repeatedly, then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Then perhaps you should find a way to isolate it?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As if hearing the most boring answer, Haicma turns her attention back to the shelves.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Spooner?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "A bit strange, but I can't say why.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'You mean this area?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I mean you, Haicma. I'm surprised by your changes, this shift that's unraveling the fundamental layer of your mindset.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "This will make you look... different to the church. I don't think those folks will ignore it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: '...Observing. Understanding. Perfecting myself. Those are parts of my mindset too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "That's not the point. The point is that Project Ark...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I'm afraid you might have to handle it here on your own for now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Sure, but where are you going?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "An old friend's here.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Despite the vagueness, Spooner is not acting like it will be an armed encounter, so Haicma does not pry any further.'}
{3: 'She is still in need of reference books she can use to decipher some human literature.'}
{3: 'Just like how one would need to first understand programs before reading about artificial intelligence, there must be an entry point into understanding "miracles."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: '"The 100th Weekend We\'ve Met"... What about the first weekend? Where is that book?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wandering between the shelves, Haicma slowly amasses a large number of books she has to find. To understand them more comprehensively, Haicma has piled all the questions she has together.'}
{3: 'But sometimes, not all questions have a definite answer.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'This... has an issue number. Where is the first one?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sees a hand passing her a book silently.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{3: 'Woosh!'}
{3: 'You briefly hear the sound of wind reverberating.'}
{3: 'Your prank has not panned out the way you expected.'}
{3: 'Instead, a book that is five centimeters thick flies at your face like a brick.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{3: "The book stops in the air. Haicma's aggression melts away as you two lock eyes."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'If not for my analysis of your voice, you would be dead by now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Still, you have shown up at the most opportune moment.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Haicma hands you the book in her arms.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I require the interpretation of a human regarding the information in this book.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What don't you understand?", 3: '71'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Based on my estimation—everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Then where should I start? The Big Bang?', 3: '73', 4: 'It will take a while to go through the whole book.', 5: '73'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'If possible. Please also summarize everything in the following books from the series.', 4: '1'}
{3: "So, you return to the bookshelves under Haicma's watchful eyes."}
{3: 'You bite the bullet and head toward where she has been, hoping to find the other books in the series.'}
{3: 'Sitting down next to the shelf, Haicma turns to the first page of the book, and there it reads "Miracles" at the forefront.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Does it mean I have to accept that "miracles" exist before I can continue reading this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her fingers gently touching the notes on the title page, Haicma looks through the gap in the bookshelf at the human whose figure just happens to overlap with the words.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Miracles... miracles... acceptance?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, Haicma realizes her neural circuit is somehow firing on all cylinders.'}
{3: 'Not only does her pile of questions remain unresolved, something else with a higher priority pushes it into a corner.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "It's similar... to what happened on the balcony?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rubbing her chest, Haicma does not have the chance to contemplate for too long as she discovers the strange presence behind her.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Why are you here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zero', 3: 'You finally noticed! I thought you were ignoring me all this time.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sitting on the two sides of the same bookshelf with their backs toward each other, Zero and Haicma talk at a volume only the two of them can hear.'}
{2: 'Zero', 3: "You've gone rusty too, Haicma. Is it because of the humans?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "The church didn't tell me you're part of this operation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zero', 3: "I was in the neighborhood, and this place always seemed interesting to me. I thought it'd be a shame if I missed it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Zero being interested in books? Even infected machines could not mutter something this nonsensical.'}
{3: 'Recalling the "old friend" Spooner mentioned, Haicma fears that Zero is not the only one here.'}
{3: "As long as Haicma can keep an eye on the human's whereabouts..."}
{2: 'Zero', 3: 'Haicma, your mind has been running much slower lately. Has something contaminated your judgment?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zero', 3: "If it's going to put Project Ark at risk, now's not too late to correct it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'This library is under the control of the human conservation area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zero', 3: "It's not too hard to fry a human's brain. As long as we mush it thoroughly, there's no chance the other humans will be alerted in time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zero', 3: 'By the way, those Constructs are busy recycling their broken toys. And accidents are prone to happen to those who travel alone.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Her scythe extends swiftly to the crunching sound of gears turning. Pages scatter into the air from the books swept off by its blade.'}
{3: 'Haicma turns to face the now empty shelf, her gaze piercing through the falling pages.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Disengage, Zero. Now.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Zero's familiar face flashes before vanishing between the white pages."}
{3: "Without her usual banters and jokes, Zero's final expression is one of surprise and confusion."}
{3: 'And as Haicma hears footsteps approaching her from behind, Zero has disappeared amidst the scattered paper.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory298.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "That's what Haicma wants. It's nothing like what you guys think.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: "That's fascinating. After all, I was sent here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Are you going to barge in and shine a spotlight on the Church of Machina?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: "Don't worry. I found something the humans hid in this library a while ago.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: "If they aren't using it anymore, then I might as well give it a chance to shine.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{2: 'You can ask me if you have any questions.', 3: '141'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I don't. Not yet.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sitting across Haicma at the table, you notice her peeking at you ever so often, to the point that she has barely flipped any pages in her book.'}
{2: 'There are guards from the conservation area watching around here.', 3: '144'}
{2: "I don't think we have to worry about Corrupted showing up.", 3: '145'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "The chances of Corrupted appearing here are less than 1%. Not that they would worry me. It's just...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'The possibility of us meeting is much lower than that. What do you think about it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What an abrupt segue...'}
{2: '(Try to press)', 3: '151', 4: '(Nothing you can do if she does not want to say)', 5: '153'}
{3: 'Haicma does not answer you. She just takes a look outside the window before immediately turning back toward you as if she is hurriedly performing a ritual.'}
{3: '... (Thanks for nothing.)'}
{2: "Perhaps some answers don't need to be a percentage?", 3: '154'}
{2: "We'll always find each other, like it's written in the stars.", 3: '157'}
{3: 'You open the book in your hand. Despite how groundless its fantasies are, those stories are always a part of how humans endure and survive.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I don't think your premise supports it based on what is written here.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm glad I've run into you for the fourth time.", 3: '162'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "My theory is that you're only here because this is the only building in this area with a unique purpose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Hypothetically speaking, if this library did not exist, there is no way that a 0.08% chance could have...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stops. Even though her expression has not changed, you can feel how much she loathes the conclusion she is about to make.'}
{2: 'It would be a shame if we missed each other.', 3: '167'}
{2: "We'd have to wait until we meet in the ruins for the fifth time.", 3: '168'}
{3: 'The wind blows past the window, catching the corners of the pages and turning them to the other side.'}
{3: 'The sun shines through the clouds, getting gradually brighter, and the words on the ivory pages seem to shimmer in the light.'}
{3: 'What was it that people said? "Language is power, and laughter is magic."'}
{3: 'Inept as you may look, you hope that the things you have done can cast away the shadows within Haicma and everyone from the conservation area.'}
{3: 'Holding down the fluttering pages, Haicma strokes the words on them once again.'}
{3: 'But immediately afterward, she smells something unusual in the calming breeze.'}
{3: 'She stands up, ignoring the chair she knocks down, looking at you as if gesturing you to stay close.'}
{3: 'In a wide passageway, the two of you move quickly in tandem. You seem to recall that this is the fire escape.'}
{2: 'Is something wrong?', 3: '181'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Don't worry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I just wanted fresh air.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory298.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: 'Detonating.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The deafening blast engulfs everything. Shattered windows, sweeping smoke, and the heat surge toward you from behind like an insatiable inferno.'}
{3: 'Haicma takes advantage of her mechanical body, closing the distance between you two and the fire door in haste.'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: '"See? Haicma can easily escape the kill box. Only the puny human will perish here."'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: '"Save your energy, Spooner. Instead of confronting me, you should think about how to correct Haicma later."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Easily slamming open the heavy door, Haicma turns and reaches out for the distressed human, ignoring the warning about the extreme heat.'}
{3: '(Estimating—the human is too slow. There is a 98.3% chance of failure.)'}
{3: 'A success rate of 1.7% is enough. She is willing to gamble on the tiniest possibility.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, she feels a pair of hands on her body, pushing her away.'}
{3: 'Miracles have not answered her prayers. Having devoured everything, fire and smoke gush out of the passage.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'As she arrives at her base at night, the night sky has already wiped away all noises.'}
{3: 'Haicma returns to the room with all her paintings. Although the proposed repairs include restoring her mind, she has rejected all of them.'}
{3: 'Her pen moves and turns, acutely illustrating the old shelves, the books of varying heights, and the uneven gaps in between.'}
{3: 'But her pen pauses mid-air as it is about to touch the part in the center.'}

{3: "Haicma goes over the decisions made in the meeting again: Zero is temporarily removed from all operations since her actions have alerted the Constructs from the conservation area, risking the Church of Machina's exposure."}
{3: "Chariot is not reprimanded, given that he was acting under Zero's proposition."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Even Spooner is...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spooner, having defended her during the meeting, also came to talk to her privately on the same topic afterward.'}
{3: 'Without exception, every key member of the Church of Machina agrees after hearing the reports—'}
{3: "Haicma's actions have deviated from the behaviors of machine logic."}
{3: 'If she had not guarded this place as quickly as possible, her paintings might have also been taken away for assessment.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'A mistake... The way I treated that human is a mistake?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She could have made excuses: an impersonation, an observation, even an infiltration.'}
{3: 'But there is a voice within her that speaks without hesitation—'}
{3: 'It is an answer from deep within her mind, a rational analysis that she is choosing to ignore.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory6.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Dawn is coming, and the face in the center of her painting has seen no progress.'}
{3: 'As the land is showered in the morning light at daybreak, all that remains in the vacant room are the brushes left behind and a picture of an empty face.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Struggling to tear a rift in the darkness, you manage to confirm that you are still alive.'}
{3: 'You try to recall the moment before you lost consciousness: realizing that you could not escape, you instinctively chose to do what you could to save Haicma.'}
{3: 'Then, how did you survive?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Are you awake?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You cannot identify the blurry silhouette, but your eyes manage to focus on the black-and-white figure.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Please don't make any sounds. There are... Corrupted nearby.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'It seems that you are placed behind a low wall. Poking her head out, Haicma is carefully keeping watch.'}
{3: 'You feel her hair in your hand, but it no longer feels smooth. You look down to find the ends charred.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Please don't worry. Your companions are expected to be on their way.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'You want to ask about her damages only to realize you cannot speak. Meanwhile, darkness threatens to overtake your numbing consciousness once more.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I'm so sorry for causing you harm...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your hearing starts to fade.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I will review all my experiences since encountering you. I hope I can find an answer...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your vision darkens...'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'So, allow me to say an indefinite goodbye...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You try to clutch the ends of her hair with your last bit of strength, but all you can grasp are the crumbled pieces.'}
